refactor(memory): replace GuestMemoryAccess with AddressTranslator

- Modify VirtioMmioDevice to use AddressTranslator for memory operations
- Update queue structures (AvailableRing, DescriptorTable, VirtioQueue, UsedRing) to use AddressTranslator
- Introduce GuestMemoryAccessor to encapsulate address translation and memory access

head_commit.message:
refactor(virtio): optimize MMIO handling and console functionality

- Remove redundant address range checks and device MMIO address calculations
- Validate MMIO access in a more centralized and efficient manner
- Improve console backend to handle Alt+F1-3 key combinations
- Update device initialization to use calculated base IPA
- Remove unnecessary is_address_in_range functions

head_commit.message:
feat(console): implement host console input polling and Alt key handling

- Add stdin_read and stdout_write methods to StdioConsoleBackend
- Implement periodic polling of host console input
- Add support for detecting and handling Alt+F1, Alt+F2, and Alt+F3 key combinations
- Update console device to use new input polling mechanism
- Improve logging and error handling in console backend

run.display_title: feat(console): implement host console input polling and Alt key handling
